mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (mem_id, pwd, name, birth, phone, gender, email, userStnum, userAddr, userDaddr) VALUES (#{mem_id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{phone}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{userStnum}, #{userAddr}, #{userDaddr})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where mem_id = #{mem_id}
select * from member where mem_id = #{mem_id} and pwd = #{pwd}

SELECT mem_id, name, email, phone, regdate, mem_status FROM ( SELECT mem_id, name, email, phone, regdate, mem_status, (@row_number:=@row_number + 1) AS row_num FROM member CROSS JOIN (SELECT @row_number := 0) AS rn ORDER BY regdate DESC ) AS ranked ORDER BY regdate DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{cntPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id} AND pwd = #{oldPassword}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET pwd = #{newPassword} WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id}

UPDATE member SET pwd = #{pwd}, name = #{name}, birth = #{birth}, phone = #{phone}, gender = #{gender}, email = #{email}, userStnum = #{userStnum}, userAddr = #{userAddr}, userDaddr = #{userDaddr} WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id}
